elements.expression:
shape "square" fill="#0b974d" border="rgba(255,255,255,0)" borderWidth=0 maintainAspect=false
| render

filters
| essql query="SELECT COUNT (*) AS count_documents FROM nginx"
| math "count_documents"
| metric "Logs" 
  metricFont={font align="center" color="#FFFFFF" family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" italic=false size=48 underline=false weight="normal"} 
  labelFont={font align="center" color="#FFFFFF" family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" italic=false size=14 underline=false weight="normal"} metricFormat="0,0.[000]"
| render

filters
| essql query="SELECT SUM(bytes) as bytes FROM nginx"
| math "bytes"
| metric "Bytes transferred" 
  metricFont={font align="center" color="#FFFFFF" family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" italic=false size=24 underline=false weight="normal"} 
  labelFont={font align="center" color="#FFFFFF" family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" italic=false size=14 underline=false weight="normal"} metricFormat="0,0.[000]"
| render

filters
| essql query="SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT remote_ip) as remote_ip FROM nginx"
| math "remote_ip"
| metric "Unique IPs" 
  metricFont={font align="center" color="#FFFFFF" family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" italic=false size=48 underline=false weight="normal"} 
  labelFont={font align="center" color="#FFFFFF" family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" italic=false size=14 underline=false weight="normal"} metricFormat="0,0.[000]"
| render

filters
| essql query="SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT agent) as agents FROM nginx"
| math "agents"
| metric "Unique agents" 
  metricFont={font align="center" color="#FFFFFF" family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" italic=false size=48 underline=false weight="normal"} 
  labelFont={font align="center" color="#FFFFFF" family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" italic=false size=14 underline=false weight="normal"} metricFormat="0,0.[000]"
| render

filters
| essql query="SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT agent) as agents FROM nginx"
| math "agents"
| repeatImage 
  image="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/ae/Globe_icon-white.svg/840px-Globe_icon-white.svg.png" size="18"
| render

filters
| demodata
| markdown "## REQUESTS STATISTICS - **NUMBER OF REQUESTS**"
| render

filters
| demodata
| markdown "## TOP 5 IP ADDRESSES - **TRANSFFERRED BYTES**"
| render

filters
| essql 
  query="SELECT request, COUNT(*) AS count_requests FROM nginx GROUP BY request ORDER BY count_requests DESC"
| table paginate=false showHeader=false
| render

filters
| essql 
  query="SELECT remote_ip, SUM(bytes) AS total_transferred FROM nginx GROUP BY remote_ip ORDER BY total_transferred DESC NULLS LAST LIMIT 5"
| table paginate=false showHeader=false
| render

filters
| essql 
  query="SELECT request, COUNT(*) AS count_requests FROM nginx GROUP BY request ORDER BY count_requests DESC"
| pointseries x="count_requests" y="request" color=""
| plot defaultStyle={seriesStyle bars=0.75 horizontalBars=true color="#3f9939"} xaxis=false yaxis=false
| render

filters
| essql 
  query="SELECT SUM(bytes) AS total_transferred_top5 FROM nginx GROUP BY remote_ip ORDER BY total_transferred_top5 DESC NULLS LAST LIMIT 5"
| math 
  {string "sum(total_transferred_top5)/" {filters | essql query="SELECT SUM(bytes) AS total_transferred FROM nginx GROUP BY remote_ip ORDER BY total_transferred DESC NULLS LAST" | math "sum(total_transferred)"}}
| progress shape="gauge" label={formatnumber "0%"} 
  font={font align="center" color="#000000" family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" italic=false size=36 underline=false weight="normal"} valueColor="#3f9939"
| render
